pages.text: In the operator utilities you will find functional items and blocks that are primarily intended for server owners, creators, map makers or experienced users. $(br2)They are only accessible via the $(l)/give$() $(l:commands)$(thing)Command$() or in the creative inventory by activating it at $(n)$(o)options/controls/operator item tab$().

$(n)Operator Utilities:$() $(br)$(li)$(l:redstone/redstone_components#command_block)$(item)Command Blocks$(): Can execute commands $(br)$(li)$(l:redstone/redstone_components#structure_block)$(item)Structure Blocks$(): Can export, import or save structures $(br)$(li)$(item)Light Blocks$(): A invisible light source $(br)$(li)$(item)Barrier Block$(): A invisible indestructible barrier $(br)$(li)$(item)Debug Stick$(): A tool for changing block states
